kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
You'll want to use the `cms.systemtable` object type which is mentioned in [the CI/CD object types docs](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/ci-cd/reference-ci-cd-object-types#general).
```XML <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RepositoryConfiguration xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
<RestoreMode>CreateUpdate</RestoreMode>
<IncludedObjectTypes> <ObjectType>cms.systemtable</ObjectType> </IncludedObjectTypes>
<ObjectFilters> <IncludedCodeNames ObjectType="cms.systemtable"> cms.member </IncludedCodeNames> </ObjectFilters>
</RepositoryConfiguration> ```
You can see an example in [the Kentico Community Portal source code](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v29.6.1.6/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Web/App_Data/CDRepository/repository.config#L17).
